means: 钟、铃声，丁当声音； <口>激烈的争论，争吵
（钟、铃）丁当作响地，发出当当声地，丁丁当当声地

entry.tran: (书面语中指铃、钟的)叮当声，叮咚声
entry.def: Ding-dong is used in writing to represent the sound made by a bell.
A ding-dong is a lively quarrel or fight.

example.ex: My two daughters had a ding-dong.
example.tran: 我的两个女儿大吵了一场。

means.word_mean: 1. the noise made by a bell
